name.description: The name of the historical figure

cultural_influence.description: A generalized but concise description of how the figure impacted society and the lasting effects of their works

major_contributions.description: A generalized but concise description of the figure's most important contributions

controversies.description: A generalized but concise description of controversies surrounding the figure, if any

interpersonal_influence.description: A description of the figure's influence on or interactions with their contemporaries and collaborators

geographical_influence.description: A description of the regions or countries where the figure's work had the greatest impact

timeline_of_influence.description: A detailed description of the figure's timeline of influence, including major events and dates of their contributions

year.description: The year or time period of the event

event.description: A description of the significant event or contribution

legacy_and_enduring_relevance.description: A summary of the figure's enduring legacy and relevance in the modern day, including how their ideas, works, or controversies are perceived now
